# deleteHistory(before:)

**Type Method**

Purges history older than a given transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
class func deleteHistory(before transaction: NSPersistentHistoryTransaction?) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **transaction**: The transaction that marks the end of the delete history request.

## Return Value

A delete history change request ([doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequest]) using an end transaction boundary.

## Purging History

- **deleteHistory(before:)**: Purges history older than a given date.
- **deleteHistory(before:)**: Purges history older than that defined by a given token.
